revised_title: Stress Tensor, Surface Tension, and Viscosity in Fluids
tldr: This article presents a general expression for the stress tensor in fluids, valid for both classical and quantum mechanics. The main application of this formula is the derivation of an expression for the surface tension of a spherical surface between liquid and vapor. The author also discusses the evaluation of stress and the derivation of known formulae for the kinetic pressure and the coefficient of viscosity.
